column5: Does anybody know of a good barometer they have been happy with? It's hard to tell good from pooh with online shopping and reviews
I have a $40 one i got from bass pro, cant remember what its called but it makes for a nice decoration hanging in my truck mirror lol. If i was to get another one i would get a digital one.

My buddy uses them all the time...  He gets some cheapie ones from BPS... They don't last super long due to moisture and getting banged around... I think he replaces it every year or something... $10-$20 maybe
Get a liquid filled barometer. They are bang on. Galileo is the brand name on mine. I cant remember where I got it though. Works like a charm, and makes a great decoration and conversation piece.  S.

I think a barograph would be better, as it tracks trends. It's the trend line (rising, falling) that's important. The ones I've seen are expensive.  I'm going to start using windfinder.com this year and see how that works.
My buddy has a watch that shows # of fish that he lives and dies with.
